briefTitle: Effect of Fluoride in a Dentifrice on Remineralization of Erosive Lesions
officialTitle: The Effect of Fluoride in an Experimental Dentifrice on Remineralization of Erosive Lesions In-Situ

interventions.name: no added fluoride in a silica base

summary: The proposed study will evaluate the performance of fluoride delivered from a new dentifrice formulation without potassium nitrate. It will also evaluate the dose-response to fluoride by testing four dentifrices covering a range of sodium fluoride concentration.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage Surface Microhardness Recovery (%SMHR) Dose Response Relationship

pValues.comp: OG000 vs OG001 vs OG002 vs OG003
OG000 vs OG001 vs OG002 vs OG003
